articles.author: Manoj Kumar, Aftab Ahmed
articles.title: India Q3 GDP growth boosted by fall in subsidies, say officials - Reuters India
articles.description: India's economic growth in the three months through December was much higher than most estimates due to a sharp fall in key subsidies which provided a boost to GDP, two government officials said.
